title: A ‘Tripledemic’? Flu and Other Infections Return as Covid Cases Rise
description: Flu cases are higher than usual for this time of year and are expected to soar in the coming weeks. A third virus, R.S.V., is straining pediatric hospitals in some states.
dc:creator: Apoorva Mandavilli
media:credit: Jamie Kelter Davis for The New York Times
media:description: A young girl receiving a Covid test at Esperanza Health Center in Chicago in September.
